socketedItems.secDescrText: Summons a Lightning Golem that grants you increased Attack and Cast speed. socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports skills that hit enemies, causing them to gain bonuses while you have resonance of all three elements, and to grant resonance of elements other than the highest one in a hit.
